Halide Renderscript application "blur" example
===

Building
---

```
$ ./build.sh
...
Done!
$ 
```

Running
---
Connected Android device needs to be "rooted", following initial set up needs to be done on the device. You will need Android sdk in the path:
```
adb shell
su
mkdir /data/tmp
mount -o remount,rw /system
```

Once folder /data/tmp is created with write permissions, continue with example execution. You will need to have android ndk in the path:
```
$ ./run.sh
...
shell@shamu:/data/tmp # LD_LIBRARY_PATH=. ./rstest
```
